message.content: read the sdk and api to get an understanding of how ultracontext works (./sdk and ./api)
Now read the view context history, store & retrieve and debugging guides under ./website/docs
do you think that the debugging is necessary as a separate guide? or we can contain it inside context history as an example?
nice, so enrich the context history with the debbuging example section and delete debugging standalone guide
We can do the same by putting the examples on the branching guide inside the fork one. DO you agree?
Actually, I want for each guide to have an examples section with practical copy and paste use cases. Can you do that? I want them to be VERY comprehensive, with Tips and comments that guide the dev
